item.title: Server MOTD
item.dc:creator: @xylo xylo
item.description:
@xylo wrote:

Maybe there should also be a link to a general help page which list all rules on the forum and server, and tells them how to get started. I think most people had get discouraged when they cant move and give up. When I first logged on, I was a bit confused about what you had to do, and that was before accounts were linked to the forum. Maybe making it easier would help get Moparcraft back up there. I know the advertising is working, i saw no less than 25 new people log on one night, and only 2 of them managed to sign in.
